channel.title: The Great Weight Debate
channel.description: A discussion about weight loss with John Thomas, the author of the best selling book "You Can Live At Any Weight You Choose". John talks about the real reasons you cannot weigh what you want.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Give it a listen!
channel.itunes:author: John Thomas
channel.itunes:summary: A discussion about weight loss with John Thomas, the author of the best selling book "You Can Live At Any Weight You Choose". John talks about the real reasons you cannot weigh what you want.

item.title: DO YOU REALLY UNDERSTAND WHY YOU MADE YOURSELF FAT?
item.description: And why you find it so difficult to lose weight?
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: And why you find it so difficult to lose weight?

item.title: ALL DIETS ARE BASED ON EMOTIONAL DEPRIVATION
item.description: That's why almost everybody who goes on any diet regains weight they thought they had lost.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: That's why almost everybody who goes on any diet regains weight they thought they had lost.

item.title: YOU WANT TO LOSE WEIGHT? YOU DON'T HAVE A CHANCE
item.description: Why would I say this when there are lots of people who promise you that you will "lose weight" if you buy what they are selling? Because "losing weight" is almost an impossible concept. Listen to my podcast and you will understand and learn what to do. It's free and I have nothing to sell you.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: Why would I say this when there are lots of people who promise you that you will "lose weight" if you buy what they are selling? Because "losing weight" is almost an impossible concept. Listen to my podcast and you will understand and learn what to do. It's free and I have nothing to sell you.

item.title: IT'S NEW YEARS. HAVE YOU MADE ANOTHER FUTILE RESOLUTION TO LOSE WEIGHT?
item.description: If you want to know why making resolutions to lose weight is futile and a waste of time listen to this podcast. There is a way to lose weight and it's free!!!
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: If you want to know why making resolutions to lose weight is futile and a waste of time listen to this podcast. There is a way to lose weight and it's free!!!

item.title: EVERYONE IS WORRIED ABOUT CHILDHOOD OBESITY. UNFORTUNATELY, THAT'S NOT THE PROBLEM.
item.description: The problem is that parents are fat and trying to tell their kids not to be fat. Don't you find that amusing? or stupid? Or something that is not going to work?
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: The problem is that parents are fat and trying to tell their kids not to be fat. Don't you find that amusing? or stupid? Or something that is not going to work?

item.title: HERE IS THE SECRET TO PERMANENT WEIGHT LOSS. REVERSE EMOTIONAL ENGINEERING ®
item.description: Yes,here it is. The only weigh to weigh whatever you want to weigh - and it's free!!!
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: Yes,here it is. The only weigh to weigh whatever you want to weigh - and it's free!!!

item.title: DO YOU REALLY, REALLY WANT TO WEIGH LESS? THEN WHY ARE YOU STILL FAT?
item.description: If you really want to weigh less, here's how to do it. First you have to understand why you made yourself fat, and are keeping yourself fat. NO, it's not the food.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: If you really want to weigh less, here's how to do it. First you have to understand why you made yourself fat, and are keeping yourself fat. NO, it's not the food.

item.title: ARE YOU STILL FAT? YOU HATE BEING FAT SOWHY ARE YOU DOING THAT TO YOURSELF?
item.description: Don't blame food. Food isn't making you fat or keeping you fat. You are doing that all by yourself. Why would you do something that stupid?
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: Don't blame food. Food isn't making you fat or keeping you fat. You are doing that all by yourself. Why would you do something that stupid?

item.title: DO YOU EAT SO MUCH BECAUSE YOU WOULD GET NERVOUS IF YOU DIDN'T HAVE FOOD IN YOUR MOUTH?
item.description: Are you fat because you feel you need to have food in your mouth. Well then, how are you ever going to stop being fat? You have to understand that you don't need all that food in your mouth. It's that simple.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: Are you fat because you feel you need to have food in your mouth. Well then, how are you ever going to stop being fat? You have to understand that you don't need all that food in your mouth. It's that simple.

item.title: GUESS WHAT? ALL THE CHOCOLATE IN THE WORLD DISAPPEARED. NOW YOU CAN BE THIN.
item.description: If all the chocolate in the world disappeared could you be thin or would have a nervous breakdown? I'm betting on a nervous breakdown!!!
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: If all the chocolate in the world disappeared could you be thin or would have a nervous breakdown? I'm betting on a nervous breakdown!!!

item.title: HOW TO WEIGH LESS FOREVER!!
item.description: Yes,you can weigh less forever and it won't cost you a penny and you don't have to go to meetings or go on a diet. No kidding
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: Yes,you can weigh less forever and it won't cost you a penny and you don't have to go to meetings or go on a diet. No kidding

item.title: STILL WONDERING WHY YOU'RE FAT AND YOU CAN'T LOSE WEIGHT?
item.description: You can stop wondering. You're fat because your need to put food in your mouth is greater than your desire to weigh less
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: You can stop wondering. You're fat because your need to put food in your mouth is greater than your desire to weigh less

item.title: EVERYONE IS WORRIED ABOUT CHILDHOOD OBESITY. FAT ADULTS TRYING TO GET THEIR FAT KIDS TO WEIGH LESS
item.description: What a joke. Fat adults will never convince their fat kids to weigh less. If you want to eliminate childhood obesity first you have to eliminate adult obesity. That, of course, will never happen. IDIOTS !!!
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: What a joke. Fat adults will never convince their fat kids to weigh less. If you want to eliminate childhood obesity first you have to eliminate adult obesity. That, of course, will never happen. IDIOTS !!!

item.title: YOU'RE FAT BECAUSE YOU WON'T LET YOURSELF WEIGH LESS
item.description: You say you are desperate to weigh less but you are unable to do so. That's because you won't let yourself weigh less. Honest.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: You say you are desperate to weigh less but you are unable to do so. That's because you won't let yourself weigh less. Honest.

item.title: DO YOU REALIZE THAT PART OF YOU LIKES BEING FAT?
item.description: That's right. It's true. That's why you gain back all the weight you thought you had lost.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: That's right. It's true. That's why you gain back all the weight you thought you had lost.

item.title: DO YOU THINK THAT YOU EAT JUST WHEN YOU ARE HUNGRY?
item.description: You must be dreaming. You eat when you need something in your mouth to make you feel better. If you just ate when you were hungry you wouldn't be overweight. Get real!!!
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: You must be dreaming. You eat when you need something in your mouth to make you feel better. If you just ate when you were hungry you wouldn't be overweight. Get real!!!

item.title: DO YOU LOVE TO EAT? DO YOU HAVE A BIG APPETITE? IS THAT WHY YOU'RE FAT?
item.description: That's all nonsense. You don't even know what your appetite is. You don't love to eat. You just have to get all that food in your mouth so you won't have a nervous breakdown.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: That's all nonsense. You don't even know what your appetite is. You don't love to eat. You just have to get all that food in your mouth so you won't have a nervous breakdown.

item.title: YOU WANT TO WEIGH LESS BUT YOU ARE KEEPING YOURSELF FAT BY PUTTING ALL THAT FOOD IN YOUR MOUTH.
item.description: You're smart. So why are you making yourself unhappy by staying fat. You know exactly what to do. You just can't do it. Until now.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: You're smart. So why are you making yourself unhappy by staying fat. You know exactly what to do. You just can't do it. Until now.

item.title: DO YOU STILL WEIGH TOO MUCH EVEN AFTER ALL THOSE NEW YEAR'S RESOLUTIONS?
item.description: You promised yourself that this year you would lose weight - for sure. And here you are still weighing too much. Are you surprised? You shouldn't be. You haven't learned how to weigh less. Until now.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: You promised yourself that this year you would lose weight - for sure. And here you are still weighing too much. Are you surprised? You shouldn't be. You haven't learned how to weigh less. Until now.

item.title: SO HOTSHOT. YOU'RE FAT AND UNHAPPY. WHAT ARE YOU GOING TO DO ABOUT IT?
item.description: Nothing. You are going to do nothing. You are going to let yourself remain fat. Isn't that just crazy!!
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: Nothing. You are going to do nothing. You are going to let yourself remain fat. Isn't that just crazy!!

item.title: THE ONLY WAY YOU WILL EVER BECOME THIN IS TO ELIMINATE THE NEED YOU FEEL TO PUT ALL THAT FOOD IN YOUR MOUTH
item.description: Diet and exercise is a waste of time. So are pills and devices to reduce the amount of food that goes into you stomach!!!
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: Diet and exercise is a waste of time. So are pills and devices to reduce the amount of food that goes into you stomach!!!

item.title: IS THE THREAT OF DIABETES ENOUGH TO GET YOU TO "LOSE WEIGHT"?
item.description: Probably not. You already know that being fat is unhealthy but there you are, still fat. No one truly understand the problem.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: Probably not. You already know that being fat is unhealthy but there you are, still fat. No one truly understand the problem.

item.title: ARE YOU FRUSTRATED BECAUSE YOU WEIGH TOO MUCH AND YOU CAN'T LOSE WEIGHT?
item.description: Join the crowd. So are a few hundred million people. But that doesn't help you because you desperately want to weigh less and you don't know how to do it.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: Join the crowd. So are a few hundred million people. But that doesn't help you because you desperately want to weigh less and you don't know how to do it.

item.title: WELL, ARE YOU READY TO TELL YOURSELF THE TRUTH ABOUT WHY YOU MADE YOURSELF FAT?
item.description: If you don't want to face the real reasons you got fat you will always be fat and will complain about it for the rest of your life. That's not a good idea. Really. Tell yourself the truth!!!!!
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: If you don't want to face the real reasons you got fat you will always be fat and will complain about it for the rest of your life. That's not a good idea. Really. Tell yourself the truth!!!!!

item.title: DO YOU KNOW WHY YOU GOT FAT? AND WHY YOU WON'T LET YOURSELF WEIGH LESS?
item.description: If you don't understand why you got fat you are never going to weigh less than you do. Want a hint? It's not the food.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: If you don't understand why you got fat you are never going to weigh less than you do. Want a hint? It's not the food.

item.title: YOU WANT TO LOSE WEIGHT? YOU DON'T HAVE A CHANCE!
item.description: Nobody you know ever permanently lost weight. So why do you think you will be able to.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: Nobody you know ever permanently lost weight. So why do you think you will be able to.

item.title: WANT TO KNOW WHY YOU GOT FAT? LOOK IN THE MIRROR.
item.description: Yes, you did it to yourself, all by yourself. Aren't you proud? Would you like to reverse the process and get thin? You've come to the right place.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: Yes, you did it to yourself, all by yourself. Aren't you proud? Would you like to reverse the process and get thin? You've come to the right place.

item.title: YOU WEIGH TOO MUCH. SO WHY ARE YOU GOING TO EAT THE CANDY THAT YOUR KIDS BRING HOME FROM TRICK OR TREATING?
item.description: Here you are weighing too much but you can't wait for your kids to bring home all that candy from hollowean. Have you lost your mind?
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: Here you are weighing too much but you can't wait for your kids to bring home all that candy from hollowean. Have you lost your mind?

item.title: YOU'RE OVERWEIGHT AND UNHAPPY. SO WHAT ARE YOU GOING TO DO ABOUT IT?
item.description: You're frustrated because you have tried everything and you still weigh too much and you don't know what to do about it. Not to worry. The solution to your problem is right here.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: You're frustrated because you have tried everything and you still weigh too much and you don't know what to do about it. Not to worry. The solution to your problem is right here.

item.title: YOU CAN REALLY IMMUNIZE YOURSELF FROM GETTING FAT !!!
item.description: Once you understand why you made yourself fat and are keeping yourself fat you can reverse the whole process and be thin. No kidding and it's free!!
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: Once you understand why you made yourself fat and are keeping yourself fat you can reverse the whole process and be thin. No kidding and it's free!!

item.title: WOULD YOU LIKE TO GET A VACCINE SO THAT YOU COULD NEVER BE FAT?
item.description: Wouldn't that be terrific! Just get a shot and eat all you want and never get fat. Actually, there is such a vaccine and it's free!
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: Wouldn't that be terrific! Just get a shot and eat all you want and never get fat. Actually, there is such a vaccine and it's free!

item.itunes:summary: What a dilemma!! It's impossible for you to weigh less because you have to keep putting all that food in your mouth.

item.itunes:summary: Just write down all the reasons you made yourself fat and are keeping yourself fat. Then you will understand your problem and you can be thin for the rest of your life.

item.itunes:summary: No kidding. It's not about losing weight. It's about understanding why you made yourself fat and are keeping yourself fat. It's that simple.

item.itunes:summary: Right now you think you have no alternative to being fat. However, if you do what i am telling you to do the day will come when you realize that you no longer have to be fat. This is what it's like.

item.itunes:summary: Don't you think it's strange that every time you lose weight you gain it back. Why do you think that is.

item.itunes:summary: You ate exactly the amount of food that you emotionally needed to put in your mouth.

item.itunes:summary: You wont let yourself weigh less. Believe it or not, you get nervous when you weigh less. That's why you always go back to what you weigh now.

item.itunes:summary: It's not about "losing weight". It's about eliminating the need you feel to keep putting all that food in your mouth. You don't have to be fat anymore.

item.title: HOW TO STOP EATING FOR EMOTIONAL REASONS
item.description: You have made yourself fat because putting food in your mouth made you feel good. You didn't really have a choice. It was something you emotionally had to do. Now I'm going to explain how to eliminate the emotional reasons that caused you to eat so much and get fat.

item.itunes:summary: You have made yourself fat because putting food in your mouth made you feel good. You didn't really have a choice. It was something you emotionally had to do. Now I'm going to explain how to eliminate the emotional reasons that caused you to eat so much and get fat.

item.title: Obesity, Obesity, Wherefore art thou?
item.description: There is no obesity crisis. Obesity is the result of putting too much food in your mouth. It is not the problem. Obesity will disappear once the problem is eliminated. Believe it or not, it's reallly easy to eliminate once you know how.

item.itunes:summary: There is no obesity crisis. Obesity is the result of putting too much food in your mouth. It is not the problem. Obesity will disappear once the problem is eliminated. Believe it or not, it's reallly easy to eliminate once you know how.

item.title: There is no obesity crisis!! It's just you and lots of other people putting too much food in their mouths!
item.description: There is no obesity crisis! Obesity is the result of putting too much food in your mouth. It ends up in your system. This teaches you how to no longer need to put all that food in your mouth.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: There is no obesity crisis! Obesity is the result of putting too much food in your mouth. It ends up in your system. This teaches you how to no longer need to put all that food in your mouth.

item.title: How to Stop Being Fat and Get Thin
item.description: You are going to free yourself from the need to keep puting all that food in your mouth. That's the whole problem. You keep putting all that food in your mouth.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: You are going to free yourself from the need to keep puting all that food in your mouth. That's the whole problem. You keep putting all that food in your mouth.

item.title: Do You Want to Be Thin or Weigh Less?
item.description: It's really simple. All you have to do is learn how to eliminate the need you feel to put all that food in your mouth!! And it's free!!
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: It's really simple. All you have to do is learn how to eliminate the need you feel to put all that food in your mouth!! And it's free!!

item.title: here's a secret that even oprah doesn't know!!
item.description: the secret is how to get thin and stay thin. It's really easy. there is nothing to buy. you can be free of the need you feel to put all that food in your mouth
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: the secret is how to get thin and stay thin. It's really easy. there is nothing to buy. you can be free of the need you feel to put all that food in your mouth

item.title: Oprah got fat again. She has the same problem you do.
item.description: Just like you, Oprah can't stop putting all that food in her mouth. She has the same emotional problem you do.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: Just like you, Oprah can't stop putting all that food in her mouth. She has the same emotional problem you do.

item.title: Why are you still fat? You won't let yourself be thin.
item.description: You are emotionally comfortable being overweight or fat. You won't let yourself be thin because you are emotionally uncomfortable weighing less than you do.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: You are emotionally comfortable being overweight or fat. You won't let yourself be thin because you are emotionally uncomfortable weighing less than you do.

item.title: Do you want to lose a lot of weight really fast- and for good?
item.description: it's really easy when you know how to do it - and it's free. you can weigh whatever you want to weigh!!
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: it's really easy when you know how to do it - and it's free. you can weigh whatever you want to weigh!!

item.title: If you're fat you don't have a weight problem
item.description: You have been trying to satisfy your emotional needs by putting food in your mouth.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: You have been trying to satisfy your emotional needs by putting food in your mouth.

item.title: Do you realize that you not only made yourself fat, you are keeping yourself fat?
item.description: Have you lost your mind?
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: Have you lost your mind?

item.title: If you're so smart why are you still fat?
item.description: So, why did you make yourself fat and why are your kids - and everyone else's kids - making themselves fat?
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: So, why did you make yourself fat and why are your kids - and everyone else's kids - making themselves fat?

item.title: If you're so smart why are you still fat?
item.description: So, why did you make yourself fat and why are your kids - and everyone else's kids - making themselves fat?
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: So, why did you make yourself fat and why are your kids - and everyone else's kids - making themselves fat?

item.title: Do You Want To Eliminate Child Obesity?
item.description: It's easy. All you have to do is eliminate adult obesity. Fat adults want their kids to be thin. What a joke!!
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: It's easy. All you have to do is eliminate adult obesity. Fat adults want their kids to be thin. What a joke!!

item.title: Do You Have Trouble Staying on Diets? Not any more !
item.description: What is it about diets that scare you? Why are you afraid to "stay" on diets? Why do you always gain back the weight you thought you had lost?
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: What is it about diets that scare you? Why are you afraid to "stay" on diets? Why do you always gain back the weight you thought you had lost?

item.title: Do you think that you are struggling with food or your weight?
item.description: You're really not. You're struggling with the need you feel to keep putting all that food in your mouth.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: You're really not. You're struggling with the need you feel to keep putting all that food in your mouth.

item.title: Help!! Help !! I'm fat and I need to lose weight !! No one is helping me
item.description: You don't want to know your real problem.Your problem is that you won't let yourself "lose weight" or weigh less. It's not the food. It's YOU>
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: You don't want to know your real problem.Your problem is that you won't let yourself "lose weight" or weigh less. It's not the food. It's YOU>

item.title: If you're fat you're going to jail !!
item.description: If being fat was a crime would you be a criminal?
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: If being fat was a crime would you be a criminal?

item.title: Are you afraid that someday you might weigh 400 pounds?
item.description: You should be. The only difference between you and a 400 pound person is that the 400 pound person has a stronger emotional need to put food in his mouth.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: You should be. The only difference between you and a 400 pound person is that the 400 pound person has a stronger emotional need to put food in his mouth.

item.title: Does God Want You To Be Fat?
item.description: If being fat was a sin would you be a sinner?
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: If being fat was a sin would you be a sinner?

item.title: The Christmas Party
item.description: You're fat but you're invited to a Christmas party and you can hardly wait to gorge yourself with food. Have you lost your mind?
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: You're fat but you're invited to a Christmas party and you can hardly wait to gorge yourself with food. Have you lost your mind?

item.title: Do You Really Know What You're Doing?
item.description: In his 15th episode John Thomas explains that the only reason you are fat is that you are putting lots of food in your mouth because it makes you feel good, and stops you from feeling bad - temporarily.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: In his 15th episode John Thomas explains that the only reason you are fat is that you are putting lots of food in your mouth because it makes you feel good, and stops you from feeling bad - temporarily.

item.title: Eliminating Your Emotional Need For Food®
item.description: In this epsisode John Thomas teaches you how to eliminate the real cause of you becoming fat and staying fat, so you don't have to be fat anymore.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: In this epsisode John Thomas teaches you how to eliminate the real cause of you becoming fat and staying fat, so you don't have to be fat anymore.

item.title: How to Stop Being Fat - Permanently (cont'd) !!!
item.description: In his 13th episode John Thomas continues to explain how permanently eliminate the real reasons you made yourself fat and teaches you how to weigh whatever you want to weigh.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: In his 13th episode John Thomas continues to explain how permanently eliminate the real reasons you made yourself fat and teaches you how to weigh whatever you want to weigh.

item.title: How to Stop Being Fat - Permanently !
item.description: In his 12th episode John Thomas explains how stop being fat - permanently. He explains you don't have a weight problem. You have simply been attempting to satisfy your emotional needs with food. He tells you how you can stop doing that so you will no longer have to be fat.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: In his 12th episode John Thomas explains how stop being fat - permanently. He explains you don't have a weight problem. You have simply been attempting to satisfy your emotional needs with food. He tells you how you can stop doing that so you will no longer have to be fat.

item.title: It's Time To Stop Being Fat
item.description: In this 11th episode John Thomas explains that you couldn't help making yourself fat and explains how to stop being fat and how you can choose what you want to weigh.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: In this 11th episode John Thomas explains that you couldn't help making yourself fat and explains how to stop being fat and how you can choose what you want to weigh.

item.title: Why Diets Are A Joke
item.description: In his 10th epsode John Thomas explains why diets are a joke and why 97% of all people who go on diets regain the weight they thought they had lost.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: In his 10th epsode John Thomas explains why diets are a joke and why 97% of all people who go on diets regain the weight they thought they had lost.

item.title: Why Your Weight Increased Over The Years
item.description: In this 9th episode John Thomas explains why you got fat; that you had virtually no control over your weight and could not stop yourself from getting fat.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: In this 9th episode John Thomas explains why you got fat; that you had virtually no control over your weight and could not stop yourself from getting fat.

item.title: The real reasons why you are fat
item.description: John Thomas, in the 8th episode explains that you weigh what you are emotionally comfortable weighing. That's why you have virtually no control over your weight. Intellectually, you may want to weigh less but emotionally you will not let yourself do so.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: John Thomas, in the 8th episode explains that you weigh what you are emotionally comfortable weighing. That's why you have virtually no control over your weight. Intellectually, you may want to weigh less but emotionally you will not let yourself do so.

item.title: Phony reasons you give yourself for being fat
item.description: John Thomas, in his 7th episode explodes the myths about why you are fat and the phony reasons you give yourself for being fat.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: John Thomas, in his 7th episode explodes the myths about why you are fat and the phony reasons you give yourself for being fat.

item.title: Why You Had To Make Yourself Fat
item.description: John Thomas, in the 6th episode tells you something no one else has ever told you. He tells you why you had to make yourself fat and why you had no control over your weight.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: John Thomas, in the 6th episode tells you something no one else has ever told you. He tells you why you had to make yourself fat and why you had no control over your weight.

item.title: Why Did You Make Yourself Fat?
item.description: This is the 5th episode of The Great Weight Debate. Author John Thomas describes the reasons why you reached an undesirable weight. "You Can Live At Any Weight You Choose" lays out the steps to keep your weight where you want it. Visit the web site http://www.emotionalchange.com for more details.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: This is the 5th episode of The Great Weight Debate. Author John Thomas describes the reasons why you reached an undesirable weight. "You Can Live At Any Weight You Choose" lays out the steps to keep your weight where you want it. Visit the web site http://www.emotionalchange.com for more details.

item.title: The Great Weight Debate - Show #4
item.description: This is the 4th episode of The Great Weight Debate. Author John Thomas describes the process by which you can manage your weight using his revolutionary process. "You Can Live At Any Weight You Choose" lays out the steps to keep your weight where you want it. Visit the web site http://www.emotionalchange.com for more details.

item.itunes:summary: This is the 4th episode of The Great Weight Debate. Author John Thomas describes the process by which you can manage your weight using his revolutionary process. "You Can Live At Any Weight You Choose" lays out the steps to keep your weight where you want it. Visit the web site http://www.emotionalchange.com for more details.

item.title: The Great Weight Debate - Show #3
item.description: This is the 3rd episode of The Great Weight Debate. Author John Thomas discusses the everyday situations that cause overeating and how to deal with them. The book "You Can Live At Any Weight You Choose" describes the overall process by which you can manage your weight. See the web site http://www.emotionachange.com

item.title: Show #1
item.description: This is the first episode of the popular radio show, based on the book "You Can Live At Any Weight You Choose". More information about the author and book can be found at "http://www.EmotionalChange.com"
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
item.itunes:summary: This is the first episode of the popular radio show, based on the book "You Can Live At Any Weight You Choose". More information about the author and book can be found at "http://www.EmotionalChange.com"

item.title: Show #2
item.description: This is the second show of The Great Weight Debate. Author John Thomas discusses more real examples of how to overcome your Emotional Need for Food® (ENF®) and live at the weight you want.
item.dc:creator: John Thomas
